tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_improvements (
  improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  improvement_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_statistics(player_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES improvement_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    speed INT,
    agility INT,
    endurance INT
);
